labelGroup.title: Label group
labelGroup.description: Selected group of labels will be used for the task generation; List of all label group can be found in the configuration UI

tags.title: Image tags
tags.description: Only images that contain all the specified tags will be used (logical AND)

owners.title: Image owners
owners.description: Only images from the specified list of owners will be used. If no owner is selected, than no restriction is applied
